name: Casual Shirt
details: A casual shirt is a laid-back, comfortable shirt for everyday wear, not formal occasions.

name: Formal Trousers
details: Formal trousers are elegant, tailored pants for special events, business, and sophisticated gatherings.

name: Denim Jeans
details: Denim jeans are casual, rugged, and comfortable pants made from cotton denim fabric, often distressed.

name: Leather Jacket
details: Leather jackets are a classic fashion staple, often associated with a cool, edgy, and rebellious style.

name: White Shirt
details: A crisp white shirt is a timeless, versatile, and elegant wardrobe essential for any occasion.

name: Black pants
details: Black pants are a chic, versatile, and timeless wardrobe staple for formal and casual events.

name: Baggy Jeans
details: Baggy jeans offer a relaxed, comfortable fit and a casual, laid-back style for everyday wear.

name: Red Tshirt
details: A red t-shirt is a bold, eye-catching, and versatile casual wear essential for any occasion.
